# Installation

iohook provides prebuilt versions for a bunch of OSes and runtime versions.

```bash
npm install iohook --save # or yarn add iohook
```

iohook currently provides prebuilt versions for the following runtimes:

- Electron:
  - 1.0.X (ABI 47)
  - 1.2.X (ABI 48)
  - 1.3.X (ABI 49)
  - 1.4.X (ABI 50)
  - 1.5.X (ABI 51)
  - 1.6.X (ABI 53)
  - 1.7.X (ABI 54)
  - 1.8.X (ABI 57)
  - 2.0.X (ABI 57)
  - 3.0.X (ABI 64)

- Node.js:
  - 4.6.X (ABI 46)
  - 5.12.X (ABI 47)
  - 6.9.X (ABI 48)
  - 7.4.X (ABI 51)
  - 8.9.X (ABI 57)
  - 9.2.X (ABI 59)
  - 10.0.X (ABI 64)
